```{r experience, echo=FALSE}
library(timevis)
library(htmltools)

timeline_data <- data.frame(
  id      = 1:5,
  content = c("<b>Telephone Researcher</b><br>Metron Analysis",
              "<b>Data Scientist</b><br>ICAP Group",
              "<b>Data Analyst</b><br>Intelen Inc",
              "<b>BSc in Mathematics</b><br>University of Athens",
              "<b>MSc in Business Analytics</b><br>Athens University of Economics and Business"),
  group = c(rep("exp",3),
            rep("edu",2)),
  start   = c("2015-01-05",
              "2016-07-10",
              "2017-05-15",
              "2008-10-01",
              "2015-10-01"),
  end     = c("2015-10-30", 
              "2017-05-12",
              as.character(Sys.Date()),
              "2013-09-30",
              "2017-01-30")
)

timeline_groups <- data.frame(
  id = c("exp","edu"),
  content = c("Experience",
              "Education")
)

timevis(data = timeline_data, 
        groups = timeline_groups, 
        width = 1000, 
        height = 300)
```
